{{ModuleFunction|MTA-MySQL}}
Sets the row cursor of a result in the given row offset. The offset must be a value between '''1''' and '''[[/Modules/MTA-MySQL/mysql_num_rows.md|mysql_num_rows()]]'''.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
mysql_data_seek ( MySQLResult result, int offset )
</syntaxhighlight>
===Required arguments===
* '''result:''' A valid MySQL result
* '''offset:''' A valid row offset

===Returns===
This function doesn't return any value.
